column4: im going to work for a hosting company as a linux admin, but its in a call center, what will i be doing? anyone know, cause i sure as hell dont.
I work for a call center as sysadmin, can't tell you exactly what are you going to work with but
I misunderstood the question, in fact if is taking calls, mostly u are going to take calls for linux problems, troubleshoot minor/major problems depending what tier you will be
